name: Attuned_Call_of_the_Sandman_E

display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, sleep duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
